title: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the application, the column icons do not appear as expected.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not displayed in the application.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons should be displayed in the application.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the application.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Navigate to the table that has columns.
4. Observe that the column icons are not visible.
